root.Summary: 1: Szkandera J, Herzog S, Pichler M, Stiegelbauer V, Stotz M, Schaberl-Moser R,Samonigg H, Asslaber M, Lax S, Leitner G, Renner W, Lenz HJ, Berghold A, GergerA. LGR5 rs17109924 is a predictive genetic biomarker for time to recurrence inpatients with colon cancer treated with 5-fluorouracil-based adjuvantchemotherapy. Pharmacogenomics J. 2015 Oct;15(5):391-6. doi: 10.1038/tpj.2015.2. Epub 2015 Feb 10. PubMed PMID: 25665511.
